name: backbone-mixin-state
description: Backbone mixin for managing view states

scripts.dist: npm run dist-model && npm run dist-view
scripts.dist-view: node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/view_mixin.es6 -t babelify -o dist/view_mixin.js --exclude backbone --exclude underscore --standalone StateViewMixin
scripts.dist-model: node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/model.es6 -t babelify -o dist/model.js --exclude backbone --exclude underscore --standalone StateModel

author: Valerii Vasin
